name: availableProducts
description:
Find products that are available

 This endpoint returns available products filtered by product code, date range or number of adult travelers


 - **Note**: Availability data is limited to a period of **12 months** into the future from the present time on the production server and **6 months** on the sandbox server.

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language into which the natural-language fields in the response from this service will be translated (see [Accept-Language header](#section/Appendices/Accept-Language-header) for available langage codes)

currencyCode.description:
**currency** in which to display product pricing
- default: `'USD'`

endDate.description: **end date** of the date range to search within (must be in the future)

numAdults.description:
**number of adult travelers** who wish to participate
- default: `1`

productCodes.description:
**array of unique alphanumeric product identifiers** specifying which products to find the availability of
- maximum: `50`

startDate.description: **start date** of the date range to search within (must be in the future)

$ul: **errorCodes**: **array** of error codes pertaining to *this* error
**errorMessageText**: **array** of error message strings in plain text
**vmid**: **unique numeric id** of the server that processed *this* request
